metadata.title: CVE-2021-3549 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: An out of bounds flaw was found in GNU binutils objdump utility version2.36. An attacker could use this flaw and pass a large section toavr_elf32_load_records_from_section() probably resulting in a crash or insome cases memory corruption. The highest threat from this vulnerability isto integrity as well as system availability.

criterions.comment: binutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
